verses.text_madani: حم
verses.translation: Ha Mim!

verses.text_madani: وَالْكِتَابِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Book that makes manifest (the truth).

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَارَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: Surely We revealed it on a blessed night surely We are ever warning--

verses.text_madani: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.translation: Therein every wise affair is made distinct,

verses.text_madani: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.translation: A command from Us; surely We are the senders (of messengers),

verses.text_madani: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: A mercy from your Lord, surely He is the Hearing, the Knowing,

verses.text_madani: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, if you would be sure.

verses.text_madani: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: There is no god but He; He gives life and causes death, your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of yore.

verses.text_madani: بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, they are in doubt, they sport.

verses.text_madani: فَارْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِي السَّمَاءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Therefore keep waiting for the day when the heaven shall bring an evident smoke,

verses.text_madani: يَغْشَى النَّاسَ ۖ هَٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: That shall overtake men; this is a painful punishment.

verses.text_madani: رَّبَّنَا اكْشِفْ عَنَّا الْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Our Lord! remove from us the punishment; surely we are believers.

verses.text_madani: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ الذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: How shall they be reminded, and there came to them an Messenger making clear (the truth),

verses.text_madani: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Yet they turned their backs on him and said: One taught (by others), a madman.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا كَاشِفُو الْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَائِدُونَ
verses.translation: Surely We will remove the punishment a little, (but) you will surely return (to evil).

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ الْبَطْشَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
verses.translation: On the day when We will seize (them) with the most violent seizing; surely We will inflict retribution.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: And certainly We tried before them the people of Firon, and there came to them a noble messenger,

verses.text_madani: أَنْ أَدُّوا إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Saying: Deliver to me the servants of Allah, surely I am a faithful messenger to you,

verses.text_madani: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي آتِيكُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And that do not exalt yourselves against Allah, surely I will bring to you a clear authority:

verses.text_madani: وَإِنِّي عُذْتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.translation: And surely I take refuge with my Lord and your Lord that you should stone me to death:

verses.text_madani: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا لِي فَاعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.translation: And if you do not believe in me, then leave me alone.

verses.text_madani: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: Then he called upon his Lord: These are a guilty people.

verses.text_madani: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِي لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: So go forth with My servants by night; surely you will be pursued:

verses.text_madani: وَاتْرُكِ الْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.translation: And leave the sea intervening; surely they are a host that shall be drowned.

verses.text_madani: كَمْ تَرَكُوا مِن جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: How many of the gardens and fountains have they left!

verses.text_madani: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: And cornfields and noble places!

verses.text_madani: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا فِيهَا فَاكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And goodly things wherein they rejoiced;

verses.text_madani: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا قَوْمًا آخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Thus (it was), and We gave them as a heritage to another people.

verses.text_madani: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّمَاءُ وَالْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: So the heaven and the earth did not weep for them, nor were they respited.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ الْمُهِينِ
verses.translation: And certainly We delivered the children of Israel from the abasing chastisement,

verses.text_madani: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ الْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: From Firon; surely he was haughty, (and) one of the extravagant.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدِ اخْتَرْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And certainly We chose them, having knowledge, above the nations.

verses.text_madani: وَآتَيْنَاهُم مِّنَ الْآيَاتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَاءٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We gave them of the communications wherein was clear blessing.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Most surely these do say:

verses.text_madani: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
verses.translation: There is naught but our first death and we shall not be raised again.

verses.text_madani: فَأْتُوا بِآبَائِنَا إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: So bring our fathers (back), if you are truthful.

verses.text_madani: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَالَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Are they better or the people of Tubba and those before them? We destroyed them, for surely they were guilty.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَاعِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them in sport.

verses.text_madani: مَا خَلَقْنَاهُمَا إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: We did not create them both but with the truth, but most of them do not know.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ مِيقَاتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Surely the day of separation is their appointed term, of all of them

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The day on which a friend shall not avail (his) friend aught, nor shall they be helped,

verses.text_madani: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Save those on whom Allah shall have mercy; surely He is the Mighty the Merciful.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ الزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Surely the tree of the Zaqqum,

verses.text_madani: طَعَامُ الْأَثِيمِ
verses.translation: Is the food of the sinful

verses.text_madani: كَالْمُهْلِ يَغْلِي فِي الْبُطُونِ
verses.translation: Like dregs of oil; it shall boil in (their) bellies,

verses.text_madani: كَغَلْيِ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: Like the boiling of hot water.

verses.text_madani: خُذُوهُ فَاعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Seize him, then drag him down into the middle of the hell;

verses.text_madani: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: Then pour above his head of the torment of the boiling water:

verses.text_madani: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْكَرِيمُ
verses.translation: Taste; you forsooth are the mighty, the honorable:

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.translation: Surely this is what you disputed about.
